definition: (used of persons' bodies) capable of moving or bending freely, a two-wheeled horse-drawn vehicle used to pull a field gun or caisson, cause to become limber
details:
adjective
- (used of persons' bodies) capable of moving or bending freely
= synonyms: supple
- (used of artifacts) easily bent
- (used of e.g. personality traits) readily adaptable
= synonyms: supple
noun
- a two-wheeled horse-drawn vehicle used to pull a field gun or caisson
verb
- cause to become limber
= example: cause to become limber
- attach the limber
= example: attach the limber
= synonyms: limber up
